## 30 Day Chart Challenge

The 30 Day Chart Challenge is a global challenge  held every April and invites data analysts and visualization enthusiasts to create a chart every day for 30 days. Each day has a different theme or chart type, encouraging creativity, data exploration and practicing analysis and design techniques.

